audioText: Vous tirerez cette arme ancienne seulement pour défendre la liberté de votre peuple opprimé par la dictature.
question: When will you draw this ancient weapon?
options: Only to defend the freedom of your people oppressed by dictatorship
During ceremonial events honoring fallen soldiers
When training new recruits in traditional combat
For historical demonstrations in military museums
explanation: The correct answer is 'Only to defend the freedom of your people oppressed by dictatorship'. The text states 'Vous tirerez cette arme ancienne seulement pour défendre la liberté de votre peuple opprimé par la dictature' - You will draw this ancient weapon only to defend the freedom of your people oppressed by dictatorship. 'Tirerez' is the second-person plural future tense of 'tirer' (to draw/pull), and 'arme' means 'weapon'.
